title: ARAM - Purchase item instant bugsplat
body:
So i am playing my first aram game in however long, but evertime i buy an item i bugsplat out of the game 100% of the time,
i have played summoner rift games today and not had this problem at all.
Is anyone else experiencing this problem and or know how to fix it?
I would send in a support ticket but every time i do i always get a recycled response "due to alot of support tickets youre in a queue etc etc. we will get to you soon" but i have never gotten a follow up email.
